meanings.definition: To bring under municipal control or ownership.
meanings.sent1: The city council is municipalizing the public transportation system.
meanings.sent2: The mayor announced plans to start municipalizing the water supply.
meanings.sent3: Municipalizing the local park will make picnics more fun!
meanings.sent4: She felt like municipalizing her workspace to increase productivity.
meanings.sent5: The community decided to municipalize the playground, making it safer for children.

meanings.definition: The act of transferring ownership or control to a municipality.
meanings.sent1: The municipalizing of the power grid led to more reliable electricity.
meanings.sent2: After the municipalizing of the library, more resources became available.
meanings.sent3: The sudden municipalizing of the road caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The municipalizing of the park brought new opportunities for community events.
meanings.sent5: The municipalizing of the school system improved educational standards.
